menu.title: Pick a Creature
menu.currentFilters: Current filters affecting your summon selection:

dialog.title: Summoning Request
dialog.request: {player} wants to summon {amount} {creature}. Do you accept?

error.loadingPack: Error loading pack "{pack}", does it exist?
error.permission: You don't have permission to do that. How did you run this function?
error.warpgate: Warpgate is a REQUIRED dependency of Foundry Summons, please enable it!

noUncommon.title: Disallow Uncommon and rarer Creatures
noUncommon.description: Uncommon and rarer options are filtered out of the Summoning Menu.

sources.title: Summoning Sources
sources.description: Select the sources you want to be available in the Summoning Menu.

onlyImages.title: Only Allow Summons With Token Images
onlyImages.description: Only creatures that have a token image will be available to summon by default.

autoAccept.title: Automatically Accept Summoning Requests
autoAccept.description: The GM no longer will need to accept a Summoning Request from a Player.

additionalIndexFields.title: Additional Index Fields
additionalIndexFields.description: Additional fields to index for filtering or display purposes.
